datas.textstart: Envision and create intelligent apps with the latest technologies announced at Microsoft Build. Get started now with pay-as-you-go pricing. There’s no upfront commitment—cancel anytime. Or try Azure free for up to 30 days.

futureready.heading: Join us now at Microsoft Build
futureready.text: Broaden your knowledge and advance your skills with deep, interactive sessions on app development—join live or watch on demand.

futureready.heading: See the latest dev tools and AI announcements
futureready.text: Create unique customer and employee experiences using comprehensive developer tools and new AI and machine learning capabilities.

futureready.heading: Just announced: Microsoft Fabric
futureready.text: Turn your data into a competitive advantage. Unify all your data and prepare it to support AI workloads with Microsoft Fabric, now in preview.

customersinnovating.text: Fujitsu increased efficiency and reduced costs by migrating its on-premises datacenters to Azure and by modernizing with cloud-first strategy
The NBA used Azure to deliver innovative experiences that keep fans engaged and help referees make consistent calls across all games
H&R Block optimizes the tax return process using Azure AI and Azure Machine Learning to quickly digitize data from forms
North Umbria Healthcare NHS Foundation Trust is helping doctors turn data into medical insights with Azure Machine Learning and the Responsible AL Dashboard
customersinnovating.customerswork: See how customers are putting Azure Al to work >

customersinnovating.text: Turn 10 Studios created a turbocharged gaming architechture for Forza Horizon 5 using Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) and other Azure Services
customersinnovating.customerswork: See how customers are putting Azure Al to work >

accelerate.text: Accelerate your migration and modernization with Azure

discover.heading: AZURE OPENAI SERVICE
discover.text: Start building with ChatGPT—now available through Azure OpenAI Service.

discover.heading: MICROSOFT AI
discover.text: See how Microsoft is making the promise of AI real with advancements grounded in our mission to help every person on the planet achieve more.

discover.heading: AZURE MIGRATE
discover.text: Easily migrate to Azure and upgrade in place your workloads reaching end-of-support in Windows Server 2012 R2 or later.

discover.heading: WORKLOAD EFFICIENCY
discover.text: Quickly apply cost optimization recommendations using the new virtual machine rightsizing capability.

discover.heading: AZURE GLOBAL INFRASTRUCTURE
discover.text: Go beyond the limits of on-premises datacenters with more regions than any other provider.

discover.heading: MICROSOFT DEFENDER FOR CLOUD
discover.text: Protect multicloud environments with antimalware scanning and enhanced data security posture management.

coFounder.textabout: Sara Chipps, co-founder of Girl Develop It and Jewelbots, and former Director of Public Q&A at Stack Overflow, has helped more than 100,000 women and girls learn to code

contentcards.heading: Start building on Azure free
contentcards.text: Get popular services free for 12 months and 55+ other services free always—plus USD 200 credit to use in your first 30 days.

contentcards.heading: Connect with a sales specialist
contentcards.text: Chat with or call a sales specialist for personalized guidance.

contentcards.heading: New to Azure? Learn at your own pace
contentcards.text: Learn the basics of cloud computing and Azure with self-paced modules on Microsoft Learn.
